sentences.en: He was tall, vigorous, sandy - haired, freckled, genial and voluble.
sentences.cn: 他个子高高的, 精神抖擞, 淡茶色的头发, 脸上有雀斑, 性情和蔼,口齿伶俐.

sentences.en: I prefer a sandy beach to a shingly one.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢沙滩,不喜欢遍布小圆石的海滩.

sentences.en: In the shaded light his sandy hair gleamed gold.
sentences.cn: 在灯光的暗影处,他黄色的头发闪着金光.

sentences.en: Sandy leaned across the table, his face uncomfortably close to Brad's.
sentences.cn: 桑迪探过桌子，他的脸跟布拉德的脸靠得异常地近。

sentences.en: She touched the thick mat of sandy hair on his chest.
sentences.cn: 她摸着他那浓密的淡棕色胸毛。

sentences.en: She was small and slight in person , pale, sandy - haired.
sentences.cn: 她身量瘦小, 脸色苍白, 头发是淡黄色的.

sentences.en: The bulk of the book concerns Sandy's two middle-aged children.
sentences.cn: 书中主要描写桑迪的两个已到中年的孩子。

sentences.en: The problem was one of liquefaction of the sandy soil.
sentences.cn: 问题是沙质土壤的液化作用.

sentences.en: The sandy beach was in sight.
The water filtered through the sandy soil and into the well.
sentences.cn: 水渗透砂土而流入井里.

sentences.en: There are white sandy beaches and crystal clear waters.
sentences.cn: 这里有白色的沙滩和清澈见底的河水.

sentences.en: Tropical plants, sandy desert, waterfalls, craters and caves make a tourist attraction.
sentences.cn: 热带植物 、 沙漠 、 瀑布 、 火山口与洞穴吸引了游客.

sentences.en: Water filters through the sandy soil and into the well.
sentences.cn: 水透过沙土渗透到井里.

sentences.en: We walked across the fields on the sandy path.
sentences.cn: 我们踩着这条沙路穿过田野.

words.tran_cn: 小孩们的运动用空地；沙地
撒沙于；以沙掩盖；用砂纸等擦平或磨光某物；使撒沙似地布满；给…掺沙子

phrases.tran_cn: 砂土；砂质黏土；砂质粘土

trans.tran_cn: 沙的，沙质的，含沙的，多沙的，沙色的
trans.tran_en: covered with sand or containing a lot of sand

trans.tran_cn: (Sandy)人名；(法、喀、罗、西、英)桑迪(教名Alasdair、Alastair、Alexander、Alister、Elshender的昵称)
